testcase.name: ifRollIsMerchantThenCantDisplaysThatRollInAnotherRoll
testcase.system-out: User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- wlnitendra User Click on the search Button After searching the role, user gets username: wlnitendra After searching the role, user gets Assigned Role: WHITELABELMERCHANT User Click on the search Button

testcase.name: ifRollIsMerchantThenCantDisplaysThatRollInAnotherRoll
testcase.system-out: User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- wlnitendra User Click on the search Button After searching the role, user gets username: wlnitendra After searching the role, user gets Assigned Role: WHITELABELMERCHANT User Click on the search Button

testcase.name: verifyUserIDInResetPasswordFunctionality
testcase.system-out: User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- tomjerry User Click on the search Button After searching the role, user gets username: tomjerry_c1 After searching the role, user gets Assigned Role: MERCHANT User click on the Reset Password Functionality Verify USEDID is matching on the Reset password User enter passowrd in password field User Verify :-Atleast one small and one capital letter, one digit, one special character User verify :- Password should be min 8 character User clear the text in the password field User enter passowrd in password field User verify :- Password should be min 8 character

testcase.name: userEnterNewPassword_UpdatePassword
testcase.system-out: User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- tomjerry User Click on the search Button User click on the Reset Password Functionality User enter passowrd in password field User click on the update Button

testcase.name: verifyTableHeaderInManageRole
testcase.system-out: Expected headers: [USERNAME, MERCHANT NAME, EMAIL, ROLE, DELETE USER, RESET PASSWORD, LOGIN, RESET 2FA] Actual headers found: [USERNAME, MERCHANT NAME, EMAIL, ROLE, DELETE USER, RESET PASSWORD, LOGIN, RESET 2FA] Expected header count: 8 Actual header count: 8 Table header verification PASSED. Headers match exactly by name.

testcase.name: displayByRoleDropdown
testcase.system-out: Verifies all the roles in display by roll dropdown is matches Verifies that First By default Selected option from Display by dropdown :- ALL

testcase.name: verifyAllTheErrorInLoginChangepassword
testcase.system-out: User search username/Merchant :- operationmerchant User Click on search button User click on the Reset Password Functionality User enter passowrd in password field User click on the update Button After searching the role, user gets username: null User enter new password in a new Password Field Verify :- Your password is too short Verify :- Your password contains sequences Verify :- Use upper case characters Verify :- Use numbers Verify :- Use special characters User enter new password in a new Password Field User enter confirm password in a new Password Field Verify that if Password is not match then this error is should be displays :- Password does not match!

testcase.name: verifyChangePasswordIfWeAlreadyDoResetPassword
testcase.system-out: User search username/Merchant :- operationmerchant User Click on search button User click on the Reset Password Functionality User enter passowrd in password field User click on the update Button After searching the role, user gets username: null Verifies :- if user enter login through the manage role then it successfully log in
